alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 8:49PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A line of showers and thunderstorms will impact the Flathead Valley through 930 PM MDT... At 847 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Whitefish to 25 miles west of Kalispell. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kalispell, Evergreen, Whitefish, Columbia Falls, Kila, Marion and La Salle. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 86 and 140. Highway 93 N between mile markers 107 and 136. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region
